nodes.long_description:
"It’s already looking like one of the better multiplayer titles on the Gear VR" -Upload VR

NEW UPDATE!
New Skills system, Leader-boards, Avatars, Gear VR Controller support, custom gamepad controls, and much more!

Live spectacular battles and frantic action with FUSION WARS. Fight on your own or coordinate with your team mates to merge your ships and reach fusion, enabling co-op action and special powers.
Never fight alone!

NOTE: Gamepad or Gear VR Controller required

Come enjoy the most sensational, frantic and fun multiplayer battles. You’ll never fight alone!

- 6 gorgeous looking levels (PvP arena coming soon!)
- Campaign for up to 4 players co-operatively
- Be the driver or the gunner (co-op fusion mode)
- Cross-Play and Cross-Buy with Oculus Rift
- (NEW) Customize your gamepad controls
- (NEW) Support for Gear VR controller
- (NEW) Avatars!
- (NEW) Skills & Progression system
- (NEW) Leaderboards
- (NEW) Improved network

Stay tuned for new updates on www.fusionwars.com
nodes.short_description:
"It’s already looking like one of the better multiplayer titles on the Gear VR" Upload VR

NEW UPDATE
New Skills system, Leader-boards, Avatars, Custom gamepad controls, Gear VR Controller support and much more!

The most spectacular and immersive battles await you at FUSION WARS!
Fight on your own, or coordinate with other players to defeat the hordes of android enemies, co-operating during the fight to merge your ships and enter the fusion mode. 
You’ll never fight alone!

nodes.long_description:
Multiplayer and fast VR action arcade combat simulator in which you will take control of a futuristic space combat tank.

Coordinate with your team mates the best strategy to defeat the hordes of enemies, and co-operate during the battle to enter the FUSE MODE, merging your tanks to become a stronger and more powerful one, enabling special weapons and features.

Recover the ENERGY CORES and bring them to base, destroying all enemy vessels and final bosses you’ll encounter on each level.

Play the ARCADE MODE for solo or co-operative games, or get into the multiplayer CORE BATTLES for PvP action and great fun.

In FUSION WARS… you will never fight alone!!!

KEY FEATURES:

-    In-game VoIP chat to communicate with your team mates
-    6 unique levels plus a special multiplayer arena
-    Unique co-op tank fusion mode
-    Spectacular battles and frantic action
-    Multiple enemies and final bosses to annihilate
-    Motion-sickness free
-    Cross-play between GearVR and Oculus Rift
nodes.short_description: Live spectacular battles and frantic action with FUSION WARS. Fight on your own, or coordinate with your team mates to merge your ships and reach fusion, enabling co-op action and special powers. Lead your team to victory in unique, immersive and frantic battles. You will never fight alone!!!

nodes.change_log:
0.9.8 GO Version !

0.9.7h SUPPORT FOR NOTE 4 !!

0.9.7 Avatars, Skills, Leaderboards... :
 - Avatars!
 - GearVR Controller Support!
 - Skill System: now your experience along the game grant you great skills and improvements for your tank.
 - Leaderboards System: compare your performance with the rest of the gunners worldwide.
 - Improved Maingun: more shoots at the same price.
 - Improved NetCode: lots of improvements in the netcode that makes the online experience a lot better. No more missed or delayed shots! No more enemies stuttering!
 - Network Optimizations: huge changes on the network system to avoid disconnections and lag.
 - New input customization system. Make any controller works however you want with the game. FIXED Panel in 0.9.7f
 - Fusion improved.
 - Improved performance.
 - Improved UI.
 - Improved Sound.
 - Lots of bug fixing and problems solved.
 - 0.9.7g Better audiomixing and first workaround for S8 audio lag problems.
 
 0.9.5c Multiplayer Improvements:
 - Fixed many disconnection problems
. - Balanced difficulty.
 - Improved netcode for lower bandwith usage, more improvements on this matter to come.
 - Improved lightmaps levels 1 and 4.
 - Fixed problem with number of Lifes on multiplayer.
 - Fixed a problem that didn't update the online game list when changing region on Options panel.
 
 
 0.9.5b LAN and Match Selection Hotfix:
 + LOCAL NETWORK GAMES (LAN) working and with VOIP if you have internet connection.
 - Recovered the panel to see the current online games.
 
 0.9.5: Difficulty levels release:
 + NEW FEATURE: Difficulty levels, unblocked gradually when you complete the game.
 + NEW FEATURE: New game selection screen where you can select the game to join.
 - Significitally improved Latency for all regions, now you can see your latency en the left panel.
 - Rumble support on gamepads.
 - VoIP working again.
 - Compatibility with the new Xbox One S controller.
 - Improved enemies AI.
 - Improved collisions with enemies.
 - Visual improvement of levels and tanks.
 - Balanced difficulty. 
 - Bug fixing & polishing.
 
 0.9.4: Keep playing release:
 + New FEATURE: You can continue your game at anytime from the last level you played. But you had to be alive !
 - No limits for Lives.
 - Improved feedback of Ray Weapons.
 - Bug fixing.
 - Solved some multiplayer issues.
 
 0.9.3: Coordinate Launch release:
 - Coordinate launch ready: launch the game directly from Oculus Rooms to play with up to 4 friends. VoIP Included.
 - Proper tracking of your score, first step for a global Leaderboard support.
 - Improved cockpit (now you can see how fast your futuristic space tank is)
 - Improved crosshairs.
 - Improved ending screens.
 - Fixed incompatibilties with some gamepads (Samsung Gamepad, etc.)
 - Bug fixing.
 
 
 0.9.2: Initial Early Access Version
 - Solved connectivity problems.
